home.heroTitle: Where Heart of Marwar Meets Soul of Ahmedabad
home.heroDescription: A spirited Marwari community thriving in the heart of Gujarat, nurturing our heritage through social upliftment, preservation of cultural values, festive traditions, and enduring bonds.

about.subtitle: About Us
about.title: A Community That Feels Like
about.paragraph1: is more than just a community—it's a family that brings together the vibrant spirit of Jodhpur to the heart of Ahmedabad.
about.paragraph2: We are a close-knit group of families from Jodhpur who have made Ahmedabad our home, yet we cherish our roots, culture, and traditions. Through regular gatherings, festivals, and celebrations, we create a space where our heritage thrives.
about.paragraph3: Whether it's celebrating Diwali, Holi, or organizing cultural events, we come together to support each other, share our stories, and pass on our rich traditions to the next generation.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.subtitle: ABOUT US
whoWeAre.intro: A group of like-minded individuals originally from Jodhpur which is also known as Bluecity of India, and now residing in Ahmedabad, joined forces to establish the Bluecity Positive Forum (BPF). BPF is a public, not-for-profit company incorporated in India and registered under Section 8 of the Companies Act, 2013, with its registered office located in Ahmedabad, Gujarat.
whoWeAre.vision: To build an inclusive, resilient, and culturally vibrant society by preserving heritage, promoting education and health, safeguarding the environment, and empowering communities for sustainable social and economic upliftment.
whoWeAre.mission: United by shared roots and a common vision, the group is committed to participating as donors and social workers. Their mission is to support the broader community, preserve traditions and culture, empower youth and women, and foster a brighter future through goodwill and solidarity.

managementTeam.title: Management Team
managementTeam.subtitle: MANAGEMENT
managementTeam.intro: The current directors are Advt. Mohanraj Mishrimal Singhi, Mr. Deepak Jain, and Mrs. Shelly Mayank Bapna. Major shareholders include CA Rajendra Agarwal, CA Vijay Kishan Mundra, Mr. Dinesh Golia, Advt. Gaurav Soni, Advt. Mohanraj Mishrimal Singhi, Mr. Deepak Jain, and Mr. Manish Jain. All promoters and directors are respected professionals and philanthropists:

members.name: Mr. M M Singhi
members.description: A prominent advocate and head of the nationally recognized law firm Singhi & Co.

members.name: Mrs. Shelly Mayank Bapna
members.description: A social worker with over 20 years' experience managing projects with institutions such as the Blind People Association, Ahmedabad, and other notable NGOs.

members.name: Mr. Deepak Jain
members.description: An established industrialist who owns a garment manufacturing unit and serves on the board of the Gujarat Garment Manufacturing Association.

members.name: CA Rajendra Agarwal
members.description: A practicing Chartered Accountant based in Ahmedabad for the last 40 years. He and his family are deeply committed to philanthropy, consistently dedicating their time and resources to various social causes.

members.name: CA V. K. Mundra
members.description: A veteran professional with 40 years of practice in Ahmedabad, a well-known figure in the Marwari and Maheshwari communities, recognized for both his professional excellence and his charitable nature.

members.name: Shri Dinesh Goliya
members.description: Representing the family behind the renowned Madhur Gur brand, carries forward an 80-year-old business tradition in Gujarat. He is widely recognized for his charitable nature and active contribution to social welfare.

members.name: Advocate Shri Gaurav Soni
members.description: The founder and proprietor of the law firm Soni & Soni, specializing in Intellectual Property Rights (IPR). He is widely regarded as an expert in the field.

members.name: Shri Manish Jain
members.description: A seasoned techno-commercial expert who holds the position of Vice President at Adani Group, backed by years of leadership in the corporate sector.
